head.title: S. B. Tingley Jr. to Wed Miss Spearman

hedline.hl1: S. B. Tingley Jr. to Wed Miss Spearman

block.p: June wedding plans have been announced for Laura Elizabeth Spearman and Samuel Bradford Tingley Jr. The bride-to-be is the daughter of Laura Smith Spearman and Dr. William B. Spearman, both of Atlanta. The prospective bridegroom is the son of Mr. and Mrs. Tingley of Barrington, R.I.

Miss Spearman, 28 years old, graduated from the Westminster Schools in Atlanta and Williams College. She and her fiance, 29, are vice presidents at Chemical Bank, she in New York with the corporate banking group, he in White Plains with the middle-market banking group.
Miss Spearman's father is a physician with the Colony Medical Group in Atlanta.
Mr. Tingley graduated from Deerfield Academy and Amherst College. His mother, Kathryn H. Tingley, is the vice chairman of Davenport Associates, real-estate owners and managers in Providence, R.I.
The prospective bridegroom's father, who is retired, was a vice president and the chief investment officer of Durfee-Attleboro Bank in Fall River, Mass.

Miss Spearman's father is a physician with the Colony Medical Group in Atlanta.
Mr. Tingley graduated from Deerfield Academy and Amherst College. His mother, Kathryn H. Tingley, is the vice chairman of Davenport Associates, real-estate owners and managers in Providence, R.I.
The prospective bridegroom's father, who is retired, was a vice president and the chief investment officer of Durfee-Attleboro Bank in Fall River, Mass.
